content: last 2 single_crochet join with slip_stitch in 1st single_crochet 14 row 4 chain 1 single_crochet in same and in each around join with slip_stitch in 1st single_crochet 14 row 5 chain 1 decrease over first 2 single_crochet single_crochet to last 2 single_crochet decrease over last 2 single_crochet join with slip_stitch in 1st single_crochet 12 row 6 chain 1 single_crochet in same and in each around join with slip_stitch in 1st single_crochet 12 pattern © 2013 kim deister the crochet witch the crafty author all rights reserved http //thecraftyauthor kimdeister com row 7 chain 1 single_crochet in same * chain 2 skip 1 single_crochet in next single_crochet * joining with slip_stitch in 1st single_crochet fasten_off and weave ends edging join with slip_stitch in the end of any row on the top edge row 1 single_crochet an even number of stitches around & join with a slip_stitch in the 1st single_crochet row 2 single_crochet in same single_crochet chain 2 skip 1 * single_crochet in next single_crochet chain 2 skip 1 * repeat from * to * joining with slip_stitch in 1st single_crochet fasten_off and weave ends finishing using tail sew side seams together fasten_off and weave ends pattern © 2013 kim deister the crochet witch the crafty author all rights reserved http //thecraftyauthor kimdeister com
